mapper.select: select q.*,u.* from COM_QUESTION q left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID=q.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE=0 where q.QUES_ID=#{id} and q.IS_DELETE=0
mapper.insert: insert into COM_QUESTION(ques_title, ques_abbre, ques_body, user_id, user_anony, ques_pub_time, ques_edit_time, rela_type, rela_id) values (#{title},#{abbre},#{body.textId},#{user.id},#{isAnony},now(),now(),#{relaType},#{relaId})
mapper.update: update COM_QUESTION set IS_DELETE=1, IS_DELETE_TIME=now() where QUES_ID=#{id}
update COM_QUESTION set QUES_TITLE=#{title}, QUES_ABBRE=#{abbre}, USER_ANONY=#{isAnony}, QUES_EDIT_TIME=now() where QUES_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select QUES_ID from COM_QUESTION where QUES_ID=#{id} and IS_DELETE=0
select count(QUES_ID) from COM_QUESTION where IS_DELETE=0
